body:
Hi Chris!
Thank you for replying me (and djordje!)
And thank you for developing the PET recipe component. Now I can finally evaluate better the PET and create the outdoor microclimate map that I need for my thesis without using the Thermal Comfort Indices Component.

Regarding the Urban Weather Generator issue, I think that for the moment, in order to generate the weather files I need for the urban simulations and analysis, I will try to use other tools that the guys of the department where I am working for my thesis are more used to. Maybe in the next days, since I'm starting to set up my work only in the Rhino/Grasshopper environment, I will also try to use Dragonfly. Anyway I will let you know and I will update you about my progresses!
Francesco
